scripts.codegen: yarn gen-yaml-config && graph codegen && echo 'import { Address } from "@graphprotocol/graph-ts";' >> generated/templates.ts
scripts.gen-yaml-config: cat template_warning.md > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/${NETWORK:-rinkeby}.json subgraph.template.yaml >> subgraph.yaml && mustache config/${NETWORK:-rinkeby}.json src/constants/chainid.ts.template > src/constants/chainid.ts
